page.title: 18TWO INTERVIEWS
page.content: Mr.Dannatt One of the most important people in the village for the last 22years is the headmaster of the school at Plumpton Green.He came here in 1963, and so he is now about to retire. Before he was in Plumpton,he was in the navy for 4 years. If he had not been a teacher he would have liked to have been an architect. P.C.Scully He is our local policeman and joined the police force becouse it was a secure job.He has been a policeman for 5years.He came from Lewes,and he likes peaceful village life.If he wasn,t a policeman he.would like to do agricultural work or.Mangerment.He finds job satisfaction in helping people.He is just about to leave Plumpton Green to work in Ditchling.
